tasks.label: Build Release (Complete)
args: cd '${workspaceFolder}'; $cmake = 'C:\tools\cmake-3.30.0-windows-x86_64\bin\cmake.exe'; if (-not (Test-Path $cmake)) { Write-Error 'CMake not found'; exit 1 }; & $cmake --build build --config Release 2>&1; $vcpkgBin = Join-Path '${workspaceFolder}' 'vcpkg_installed\x64-windows\bin'; $exeDir = Join-Path '${workspaceFolder}' 'build\bin\Release'; if (Test-Path $vcpkgBin) { if (-not (Test-Path $exeDir)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $exeDir | Out-Null }; Get-ChildItem -Path $vcpkgBin -Filter *.dll -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { Copy-Item $_.FullName -Destination $exeDir -Force } }
tasks.detail: Build Release + copy runtime DLLs (ready for F5 debug).
